    • Uses of StringFilter in com.composum.sling.core.filter

      Classes in com.composum.sling.core.filter that implement StringFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  StringFilter.All
      the 'all enabled' implementation: filters nothing, each value is appropriate
      static class  StringFilter.BlackList
      The 'BlackList' is a pattern based filter which accepts all values NOT containing a substring matching to one of its patterns (see Matcher.find()).
      static class  StringFilter.FilterBase
      the abstract base for filters which are using regular expression patterns
      static class  StringFilter.FilterSet
      An implementation to combine StringFilters to complex rules.
      static class  StringFilter.Not
      the 'Not...' implementation to invert a filter
      static class  StringFilter.PatternList
      the abstract base for filters which are using regular expression patterns
      static class  StringFilter.WhiteList
      The 'WhiteList' is a pattern based filter which accepts all values that contain a substring matching one of its patterns (see Matcher.find()).
      Fields in com.composum.sling.core.filter declared as StringFilter 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static StringFilter StringFilter.ALL
      the predefined filter instance which accepts each string value
      protected StringFilter ResourceFilter.PatternFilter.filter
      the filter instance for the value
      protected StringFilter StringFilter.Not.filter

      Constructors in com.composum.sling.core.filter with parameters of type StringFilter 
      Constructor Description
      FilterSet​(StringFilter.FilterSet.Rule rule, StringFilter... filters)
      Combines a set of filter instances by a combination rule
      MimeTypeFilter​(StringFilter filter)
      The constructor based on a StringFilter for the 'mimeType' property.
      NameFilter​(StringFilter filter)
      The constructor based on a StringFilter for the name value.
      NodeTypeFilter​(StringFilter filter)
      A ResourceFilter implementation which checks for JCR node types similar to Node.isNodeType(String) - both primary type and all direct and inherited mixin types are checked against the filters.
      Not​(StringFilter filter)  
      PathFilter​(StringFilter filter)
      The constructor based on a StringFilter for the resources path.
      PrimaryTypeFilter​(StringFilter filter)
      The constructor based on a StringFilter for the resources primary type.
      PropertyFilter​(String propertyName, StringFilter filter)
      The constructor based on a StringFilter for the property value.
      ResourceTypeFilter​(StringFilter filter)
      The constructor based on a StringFilter for the resources sling component type.
      Constructor parameters in com.composum.sling.core.filter with type arguments of type StringFilter

    • Uses of StringFilter in com.composum.sling.core.mapping

      Fields in com.composum.sling.core.mapping declared as StringFilter 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      StringFilter MappingRules.exportPropertyFilter
      the filter for the properties (their names) of a resource
      StringFilter MappingRules.importPropertyFilter
      the filter for the properties (their names) of a resource
      static StringFilter MappingRules.MAPPING_EXPORT_FILTER
      the default property name filter to restrict the export - all properties are exported by default
      static StringFilter MappingRules.MAPPING_IMPORT_FILTER
      the default property name filter to restrict the import - creation properties are disabled
      static StringFilter MappingRules.SOURCE_EXPORT_FILTER
      the property name filter to ignore automatic or transient properties not useful in source code
      Constructors in com.composum.sling.core.mapping with parameters of type StringFilter 
      Constructor Description
      MappingRules​(ResourceFilter resourceFilter, StringFilter exportPropertyFilter, StringFilter importPropertyFilter, MappingRules.PropertyFormat propertyFormat, Integer maxDepth, MappingRules.ChangeRule changeRule)
      Generates a resource traversal filter for generation JSON objects.
